title: Services for Researchers: Libraries - Northwestern University
content: We recommend contacting us in advance before you visit to ensure your desired materials are available. See the Out-of-Town Visitor Resources webpage for information about accommodations, travel and more. We also offer: Image scanning services are available to faculty, staff and graduate students. Digital Collections can deliver images to patrons in various file formats and resolutions for electronic presentations, printing or archiving.  Learn more. Learn about rights, permissions and reproduction policies.
